web_snippets: In this talk, Dr. Julianne Holt-Lunstad shares groundbreaking research showing that lacking social connection can be as harmful as smoking up to 15 cigarettes a ...
Dr. Julianne Holt-Lunstad is a professor of psychology and neuroscience and director of the Social Connection & Health Lab at Brigham Young University.
Dr. Julianne Holt-Lunstad is a Professor of Psychology and Neuroscience at Brigham Young University and a member of the CASJE Research Network.
